com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection

Interface MethodAccessor<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SafeDirectMethod, SafeMethod

    public interface MethodAccessor<T>
    Defines the methods to access a certain method

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T invoke(java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.Object... args)
      Executes the method
      boolean isValid()
      Checks whether this Method accessor is in a valid state
      Only if this return true can this safe accessor be used without problems

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Checks whether this Method accessor is in a valid state
        Only if this return true can this safe accessor be used without problems
        Returns:
        True if this accessor is valid, False if not

      • invoke

        T invoke(java.lang.Object instance,
       java.lang.Object... args)
        Executes the method
        Parameters:
        instance - of the class the method is in, use null if it is a static method
        args - to use for the method
        Returns:
        A possible returned value from the method, is always null if the method is a void
